step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with your arm overhead. Try to keep your shoulder relaxed.
Excellent! Keep that arm straight overhead and feel the stretch.
Great job opening your hand wide. Ensure your fingers are spread as much as possible.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles as you inhaled. Remember to visualize the fluid moving.
Good start to the second rep. Keep that arm straight overhead and feel the stretch.
Excellent! Continue to keep your arm straight overhead.
Great job opening your hand wide again. Spread those fingers!
Fantastic! You made a strong fist while inhaling. Keep up the great work visualizing the fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch. Opening your hand wide and making a strong fist while inhaling helps promote lymph flow. Keep practicing this to help reduce fluid buildup.
